NewYork.speaker: Bored Civilian
NewYork.line: You ever seen those old holo movies? The one with the killer robot from the future with a shotgun is my favorite.

NewYork.speaker: ECM Soldier
NewYork.line: They say the old aircraft carrier, Midway I think? Used to be the best ship in the world, kinda hard to believe we had water fleets at one point

NewYork.speaker: Market Worker
NewYork.line: I've never even heard of the ortho mega structure till those nerds at the PRS talked about it, some underwater mega structure I think?

NewYork.speaker: ECM Officer
NewYork.line: Don't loiter here please, the street cleaners will be here soon

NewYork.speaker: Street Vendor
NewYork.line: Fresh synth-bread! Made with real imported grain from the colony farms!

NewYork.speaker: Commuter
NewYork.line: Another power brownout last night. When are they fixing the grid?

NewYork.speaker: News Anchor
NewYork.line: ...reports of strange signals from the Jupiter research stations continue to worry officials...

NewYork.speaker: Child
NewYork.line: Mom, why can't we go swimming in the real ocean like in the old vids?

NewYork.speaker: Tourist
NewYork.line: I heard they found something big under the Pacific. Government's keeping it quiet though.

NewYork.speaker: Construction Worker
NewYork.line: These new buildings are weird, all these electromagnetic shielding requirements since the Kolki disaster.

NewYork.speaker: Elderly Man
NewYork.line: Back in my day, we didn't need atmosphere suits just to go outside during storm season.

NewYork.speaker: Student
NewYork.line: Professor says the mega structures are older than human civilization. That's impossible, right?

NewYork.speaker: Police Officer
NewYork.line: Keep the crowds moving. We don't need another stampede like last month.

NewYork.speaker: Maintenance Tech
NewYork.line: These old subway tunnels keep flooding. Something's wrong with the water table.

NewYork.speaker: Bartender
NewYork.line: Another round for the excavation crew? You guys look like you've seen some things.

NewYork_Downtown.speaker: Transit Officer
NewYork_Downtown.line: All lanes clear. Metro 5 is delayed due to power reroute, it'll be back in a few minutes.

NewYork_Downtown.speaker: Vendor
NewYork_Downtown.line: Get your synth-tacos! Grown under real UV!

NewYork_Downtown.speaker: Courier
NewYork_Downtown.line: Skylift was stuck again. I'm climbing that thing next time.

NewYork_Downtown.speaker: Civilian
NewYork_Downtown.line: They say the archives are haunted — like real ghosts from the Red War.

NewYork_Downtown.speaker: Business Executive
NewYork_Downtown.line: The quarterly reports show massive investment in deep sea operations. What are they really looking for?

NewYork_Downtown.speaker: Street Musician
NewYork_Downtown.line: This old guitar survived the Kolki disaster. Still plays like a dream.

NewYork_Downtown.speaker: Security Guard
NewYork_Downtown.line: Another blackout drill today. Third one this month, getting suspicious.

NewYork_Downtown.speaker: Delivery Driver
NewYork_Downtown.line: Traffic's backed up all the way to the harbor. Some kind of military convoy.

NewYork_Downtown.speaker: Homeless Veteran
NewYork_Downtown.line: I was there when the first mega structure was discovered. Nobody believed the reports.

NewYork_Downtown.speaker: Shop Owner
NewYork_Downtown.line: Business has been slow since they started the deep excavations. People are nervous.

NewYork_Downtown.speaker: Emergency Responder
NewYork_Downtown.line: Radiation levels are slightly elevated near the old district. Probably nothing to worry about.

NewYork_Downtown.speaker: College Student
NewYork_Downtown.line: My thesis is on pre-disaster architecture. These buildings weren't designed for what we're seeing now.

NewYork_Downtown.speaker: Corporate Spy
NewYork_Downtown.line: The ECS is moving a lot of equipment through here. Big operation starting up.

NewYork_Downtown.speaker: City Planner
NewYork_Downtown.line: We need to redesign the entire grid. These power fluctuations are getting worse.

NewYork_Downtown.speaker: Journalist
NewYork_Downtown.line: Sources say there's been contact with something down there. Officials deny everything.

NewYork_Torta.speaker: Excavator
NewYork_Torta.line: Torta shell's denser than we thought. Plasma cutters barely scratch it.

NewYork_Torta.speaker: ECS Engineer
NewYork_Torta.line: Stay off the red-marked zones. Last week one just... collapsed.

NewYork_Torta.speaker: Research AI
NewYork_Torta.line: Caution: ambient radiation near node six exceeds safe levels, you'll get radiation poisoning.

NewYork_Torta.speaker: Foreman
NewYork_Torta.line: Get that drone out of the dig trench or we lose it *again*. The boss will kill us if we lose it.

NewYork_Torta.speaker: Geology Specialist
NewYork_Torta.line: These material compositions don't match anything in our databases. It's like it's from another world.

NewYork_Torta.speaker: Safety Inspector
NewYork_Torta.line: I'm shutting down sector 7 until we figure out why the Geiger counters keep screaming.

NewYork_Torta.speaker: Heavy Equipment Operator
NewYork_Torta.line: The drill bits are wearing out faster than usual. This stuff is harder than diamond.

NewYork_Torta.speaker: Site Medic
NewYork_Torta.line: Another worker with severe headaches. That's the fifth one this week.

NewYork_Torta.speaker: Structural Engineer
NewYork_Torta.line: The whole excavation site is vibrating at a frequency that shouldn't be possible.

NewYork_Torta.speaker: Security Chief
NewYork_Torta.line: No unauthorized personnel past checkpoint alpha. We've had too many incidents.

NewYork_Torta.speaker: Environmental Monitor
NewYork_Torta.line: Air quality readings are... unusual. I've never seen atmospheric composition like this.

NewYork_Torta.speaker: Deep Core Technician
NewYork_Torta.line: We hit another chamber today. The walls are covered in symbols that hurt to look at.

NewYork_Torta.speaker: Communications Officer
NewYork_Torta.line: Radio interference is getting worse the deeper we go. Something's jamming our signals.

NewYork_Torta.speaker: Research Assistant
NewYork_Torta.line: The artifacts we're pulling up are still warm. They've been buried for centuries, how is that possible?

NewYork_Torta.speaker: Crane Operator
NewYork_Torta.line: That last piece we hauled up... I swear it was humming. Gave me chills.

NewYork_Transit.speaker: Nexus Operator
NewYork_Transit.line: Shuttle seven rerouted. Atmospheric traffic dense over Tier 4.

NewYork_Transit.speaker: Announcer
NewYork_Transit.line: Please keep limbs inside transit cars during ascension, we do not need any traumatic injuries.

NewYork_Transit.speaker: Technician
NewYork_Transit.line: Mag-lift coils just burned out — again. We need replacements from Mars, the consequences of not upgrading since the kolki disaster.

NewYork_Transit.speaker: Traffic Controller
NewYork_Transit.line: Aerial lanes 3 through 8 are closed due to electromagnetic interference. Use ground routes.

NewYork_Transit.speaker: Maintenance Worker
NewYork_Transit.line: These new transit pods have weird shielding. What are they protecting us from?

NewYork_Transit.speaker: Passenger
NewYork_Transit.line: My commute used to take 20 minutes. Now with all these detours and security checks, it's over an hour.

NewYork_Transit.speaker: Transit AI
NewYork_Transit.line: Warning: unusual energy readings detected in tunnel section 12. Rerouting traffic.

NewYork_Transit.speaker: Emergency Responder
NewYork_Transit.line: Another medical emergency on platform 6. These dizzy spells are becoming too common.

NewYork_Transit.speaker: Station Manager
NewYork_Transit.line: Corporate wants us to install more radiation detectors. They're not telling us why.

NewYork_Transit.speaker: Engineer
NewYork_Transit.line: The new maglev systems keep getting interference from somewhere underground.

NewYork_Transit.speaker: Commuter
NewYork_Transit.line: Did you feel that rumble? That's not normal for a transit station.

NewYork_Transit.speaker: Security Supervisor
NewYork_Transit.line: Increase patrols near the lower levels. There have been reports of strange sounds.

NewYork_Transit.speaker: System Administrator
NewYork_Transit.line: Navigation computers keep glitching near the old subway connections. Something's interfering.

NewYork_Transit.speaker: Public Relations Officer
NewYork_Transit.line: Remember, any unusual experiences should be reported to management immediately. For everyone's safety.

EarthSpacePort.speaker: Sleep deprived worker
EarthSpacePort.line: So many crates and vehicles to load and unload...

EarthSpacePort.speaker: Process Officer
EarthSpacePort.line: All immigrants please fill out the file before you so we can begin processing

EarthSpacePort.speaker: PCS Officer
EarthSpacePort.line: The port civil service is a easier job, its basically just the coast guard but re-named, you know, those pre kilko disaster guys?

EarthSpacePort.speaker: Cargo Inspector
EarthSpacePort.line: This shipment's manifest doesn't match the contents. Someone's smuggling again.

EarthSpacePort.speaker: Flight Controller
EarthSpacePort.line: Departure window for Europa is closing in 30 minutes. All passengers board now.

EarthSpacePort.speaker: Customs Agent
EarthSpacePort.line: Sir, you'll need a special permit for that artifact. No exceptions.

EarthSpacePort.speaker: Port Administrator
EarthSpacePort.line: Traffic is backed up to Luna orbit. We need more docking bays.

EarthSpacePort.speaker: Baggage Handler
EarthSpacePort.line: This crate is heavier than it should be. And it's warm to the touch.

EarthSpacePort.speaker: Immigration Officer
EarthSpacePort.line: Another wave of refugees from the outer colonies. They all have the same haunted look.

EarthSpacePort.speaker: Maintenance Chief
EarthSpacePort.line: The gravitational stabilizers are acting up again. Something's pulling at them.

EarthSpacePort.speaker: Security Scanner
EarthSpacePort.line: Unknown energy signature detected in cargo bay 12. Initiating lockdown.

EarthSpacePort.speaker: Passenger
EarthSpacePort.line: My family's been waiting three days for clearance to Mars. What's the holdup?

EarthSpacePort.speaker: Freight Coordinator
EarthSpacePort.line: Another ship from the deep space stations. Their crew looks... different.

EarthSpacePort.speaker: Medical Officer
EarthSpacePort.line: We're seeing more cases of what they're calling 'void sickness.' Symptoms are troubling.

EarthSpacePort.speaker: Communications Tech
EarthSpacePort.line: We're getting strange transmissions from the Jupiter system. Should we report this?

EarthSpacePort_FrontDesk.speaker: Customs AI
EarthSpacePort_FrontDesk.line: Declare all mega structure artifacts immediately. Failure results in fines or prison if you lack a permit and do not declare.

EarthSpacePort_FrontDesk.speaker: Pilot
EarthSpacePort_FrontDesk.line: Some of these tourists are bringing in *void berries*. That's not legal yet, right?

EarthSpacePort_FrontDesk.speaker: Port Staff
EarthSpacePort_FrontDesk.line: Dock 8's inspection line is backed up. Why do they keep letting mega freighters unload cargo there?!

EarthSpacePort_FrontDesk.speaker: Immigration Clerk
EarthSpacePort_FrontDesk.line: Your ID chip is showing some unusual readings. Please step aside for additional screening.

EarthSpacePort_FrontDesk.speaker: Ticket Agent
EarthSpacePort_FrontDesk.line: Next departure to Mars Colony is fully booked. Best I can do is a cargo transport.

EarthSpacePort_FrontDesk.speaker: Security Officer
EarthSpacePort_FrontDesk.line: Ma'am, that item is registering as potentially hazardous. I'll need to confiscate it.

EarthSpacePort_FrontDesk.speaker: Information Desk
EarthSpacePort_FrontDesk.line: Due to increased security measures, processing times have been extended indefinitely.

EarthSpacePort_FrontDesk.speaker: Quarantine Officer
EarthSpacePort_FrontDesk.line: All passengers from the Titan stations need medical clearance before proceeding.

EarthSpacePort_FrontDesk.speaker: Baggage Claim Attendant
EarthSpacePort_FrontDesk.line: Your luggage was flagged for inspection. It should be returned within 24-48 hours.

EarthSpacePort_FrontDesk.speaker: Travel Agent
EarthSpacePort_FrontDesk.line: I wouldn't recommend Jupiter system tours right now. Too many... incidents.

EarthSpacePort_FrontDesk.speaker: Customer Service
EarthSpacePort_FrontDesk.line: The delays are due to enhanced security protocols. I can't provide more details.

EarthSpacePort_FrontDesk.speaker: Document Checker
EarthSpacePort_FrontDesk.line: This visa stamp is smudged. Where exactly did you say you were coming from?

EarthSpacePort_FrontDesk.speaker: Health Inspector
EarthSpacePort_FrontDesk.line: Another passenger showing signs of neural degradation. Fourth one today.

EarthSpacePort_FrontDesk.speaker: Lost and Found
EarthSpacePort_FrontDesk.line: Sir, we can't return this item to you. It's been classified as restricted material.

EarthSpacePort_FrontDesk.speaker: Priority Screening
EarthSpacePort_FrontDesk.line: Government officials and ECS personnel report to desk 7 for expedited processing.

EarthSpacePort_Cargo.speaker: Loader
EarthSpacePort_Cargo.line: This crate's got old markings… like *Red War* era, kinda scared to touch it.

EarthSpacePort_Cargo.speaker: Dockmaster
EarthSpacePort_Cargo.line: Cargo bay 12 is leaking again. Someone patch it up or we're gonna get sued if zero point energy kills someone.

EarthSpacePort_Cargo.speaker: Security
EarthSpacePort_Cargo.line: No one touches the frozen containers. Orders from above, and I'd rather not know what needs to be frozen.

EarthSpacePort_Cargo.speaker: Forklift Operator
EarthSpacePort_Cargo.line: These mega structure artifacts keep getting heavier during transport. Physics doesn't work that way.

EarthSpacePort_Cargo.speaker: Shipping Clerk
EarthSpacePort_Cargo.line: Half these manifests are classified. I just move boxes and don't ask questions.

EarthSpacePort_Cargo.speaker: Cargo Scanner
EarthSpacePort_Cargo.line: This container is showing internal movement. That's... not supposed to happen.

EarthSpacePort_Cargo.speaker: Warehouse Manager
EarthSpacePort_Cargo.line: Keep the exotic material shipments in the shielded section. We've had enough accidents.

EarthSpacePort_Cargo.speaker: Safety Inspector
EarthSpacePort_Cargo.line: Radiation levels in bay 7 are climbing. Evacuate the area until we figure out why.

EarthSpacePort_Cargo.speaker: Heavy Lifter
EarthSpacePort_Cargo.line: My exo-suit's sensors keep malfunctioning around those research containers.

EarthSpacePort_Cargo.speaker: Quality Control
EarthSpacePort_Cargo.line: Three shipments this week have arrived with... modifications. Not on the original specs.

EarthSpacePort_Cargo.speaker: Loading Supervisor
EarthSpacePort_Cargo.line: The night shift reports hearing sounds from the sealed cargo. Just log it and move on.

EarthSpacePort_Cargo.speaker: Container Inspector
EarthSpacePort_Cargo.line: This shipment from Europa has ice crystals that aren't melting. Temperature's normal though.

EarthSpacePort_Cargo.speaker: Inventory Clerk
EarthSpacePort_Cargo.line: We're missing 12 containers from the Jupiter shipment. They just... vanished from tracking.

EarthSpacePort_Cargo.speaker: Hazmat Specialist
EarthSpacePort_Cargo.line: Whatever's in container X-7 is reading off the charts for exotic particles.

EarthSpacePort_Cargo.speaker: Freight Handler
EarthSpacePort_Cargo.line: The ECS containers always give me the creeps. They hum when you get close.

EarthSpacePort_Docking.speaker: Tired Dockhand
EarthSpacePort_Docking.line: Another civilian shuttle just clipped the gantry. That's the third this week, getting tiring to repair.

EarthSpacePort_Docking.speaker: Annoyed Pilot
EarthSpacePort_Docking.line: Got fuel, got clearance, still sitting here. Typical Earth port.

EarthSpacePort_Docking.speaker: Boarding Agent
EarthSpacePort_Docking.line: Next group to Europa, line up at Dock 17, move quick and orderly!

EarthSpacePort_Docking.speaker: Docking Controller
EarthSpacePort_Docking.line: Berth 23 is showing gravitational anomalies. Redirect incoming traffic.

EarthSpacePort_Docking.speaker: Fuel Technician
EarthSpacePort_Docking.line: The fusion cells from the deep space haulers are running way hotter than normal.

EarthSpacePort_Docking.speaker: Ship Inspector
EarthSpacePort_Docking.line: This vessel's hull shows impact damage from... something. What were you hauling?

EarthSpacePort_Docking.speaker: Traffic Coordinator
EarthSpacePort_Docking.line: We've got a priority ECS vessel requesting immediate docking. Clear lanes 4 through 8.

EarthSpacePort_Docking.speaker: Maintenance Bot
EarthSpacePort_Docking.line: Atmospheric processors offline in dock 15. Toxic leak contained.

EarthSpacePort_Docking.speaker: Passenger Services
EarthSpacePort_Docking.line: All passengers please remain in designated areas. Security sweep in progress.

EarthSpacePort_Docking.speaker: Cargo Bay Operator
EarthSpacePort_Docking.line: The automated systems keep rejecting certain shipments. Won't say why.

EarthSpacePort_Docking.speaker: Emergency Response
EarthSpacePort_Docking.line: Medical team to dock 9. We have another case of 'void exposure.'

EarthSpacePort_Docking.speaker: Port Authority
EarthSpacePort_Docking.line: Unscheduled arrival from the outer rim. Running full decontamination protocols.

EarthSpacePort_Docking.speaker: Docking Pilot
EarthSpacePort_Docking.line: Navigation computers went haywire near that research vessel. Had to dock manually.

EarthSpacePort_Docking.speaker: Station AI
EarthSpacePort_Docking.line: Warning: unusual electromagnetic signatures detected from berths 12-16.

EarthSpacePort_Docking.speaker: Customs Drone
EarthSpacePort_Docking.line: Contraband detected in multiple compartments. Initiating full cargo inspection.

Pacific.speaker: Marine Biologist
Pacific.line: Deep sea readings are off the charts today, makes me excited!

Pacific.speaker: Research Tech
Pacific.line: Another ortho mega structure artifact surfaced near the thermal vents.

Pacific.speaker: Platform Chief
Pacific.line: Keep the dive teams close to base. Something's stirring down there, we gotta be ready to react.

Pacific.speaker: Scientist
Pacific.line: The anomaly signatures match pre-disaster patterns, very concerning!

Pacific.speaker: Sonar Operator
Pacific.line: I'm picking up sounds from the deep trench. They sound almost... mechanical.

Pacific.speaker: Dive Master
Pacific.line: The water temperature at 3000 meters is increasing. That's not normal for these depths.

Pacific.speaker: Oceanographer
Pacific.line: Current patterns have completely shifted. Something massive is affecting the ocean floor.

Pacific.speaker: Submersible Pilot
Pacific.line: My instruments went crazy when I got near that structure. Had to surface immediately.

Pacific.speaker: Research Coordinator
Pacific.line: We're pulling up organisms that don't match any known species. Evolution doesn't work this fast.

Pacific.speaker: Deep Sea Engineer
Pacific.line: The pressure readings down there are impossible. It's like space-time is being warped.

Pacific.speaker: Environmental Monitor
Pacific.line: Chemical composition of the water is changing daily. Something's releasing compounds.

Pacific.speaker: Seismic Specialist
Pacific.line: The earthquake patterns suggest something is moving under the ocean floor.

Pacific.speaker: Communications Officer
Pacific.line: We're getting structured signals from the deep ocean. They're not natural.

Pacific.speaker: Marine Geologist
Pacific.line: These rock samples contain materials that shouldn't exist on Earth.

Pacific.speaker: Safety Coordinator
Pacific.line: All deep dives are suspended until we understand what's happening down there.

ColonyCore_Residential.speaker: Resident
ColonyCore_Residential.line: The filtration system hums differently today. Something's off, I'll file a request for the filters to be checked.

ColonyCore_Residential.speaker: Teacher
ColonyCore_Residential.line: Kids learned how Earth grass smells — using a VR module, of course, I hope mars will be green when they grow up.

ColonyCore_Residential.speaker: Medic
ColonyCore_Residential.line: Report all headaches or dizziness. Dome pressure fluctuated last night, nose bleeds can also be a symptom.

ColonyCore_Residential.speaker: Maintenance Worker
ColonyCore_Residential.line: The atmospheric processors are working overtime. Something's contaminating the air supply.

ColonyCore_Residential.speaker: Colony Administrator
ColonyCore_Residential.line: Water rations are being reduced again. The recycling systems can't keep up with demand.

ColonyCore_Residential.speaker: Child
ColonyCore_Residential.line: Mom, why can't we go outside without the breathing masks anymore?

ColonyCore_Residential.speaker: Hydroponics Farmer
ColonyCore_Residential.line: The plants in sector 7 are growing strangely. Bigger, but wrong somehow.

ColonyCore_Residential.speaker: Psychological Counselor
ColonyCore_Residential.line: More residents are reporting nightmares about things in the dark. It's becoming an epidemic.

ColonyCore_Residential.speaker: Building Supervisor
ColonyCore_Residential.line: The structural integrity sensors keep triggering false alarms. At least, I hope they're false.

ColonyCore_Residential.speaker: Community Leader
ColonyCore_Residential.line: We need to stay positive. The supply ship from Earth is only three months overdue.

ColonyCore_Residential.speaker: Elderly Resident
ColonyCore_Residential.line: This place used to feel like home. Now it feels like we're hiding from something.

ColonyCore_Residential.speaker: Youth Coordinator
ColonyCore_Residential.line: The teenagers keep talking about voices in the walls. Probably just colony acoustics.

ColonyCore_Residential.speaker: Nutritionist
ColonyCore_Residential.line: The synthetic food supplements are causing unusual side effects. Increased alertness, strange dreams.

ColonyCore_Residential.speaker: Housing Officer
ColonyCore_Residential.line: Relocation requests have tripled. Everyone wants to move away from the outer sections.

ColonyCore_Residential.speaker: Colony Historian
ColonyCore_Residential.line: The original colony records mention finding something in the ground during construction. Files are mostly corrupted now.

ColonyCore_Market.speaker: Mischievous Vendor
ColonyCore_Market.line: Synthberry juice, 40% off! Ignore the warning label! Perfectly Safe!

ColonyCore_Market.speaker: Smuggler
ColonyCore_Market.line: Looking for exo-grade components? I might have what you need...provided you won't tell.

ColonyCore_Market.speaker: Frustrated Patroller
ColonyCore_Market.line: Keep your permits visible. We're cracking down on unauthorized traders, bastards tried to smuggle in guns, we got enough trouble makers, we don't need corpses.

ColonyCore_Market.speaker: Black Market Dealer
ColonyCore_Market.line: Fresh neural implants from Earth. Only slightly used, previous owner won't be needing them.

ColonyCore_Market.speaker: Produce Vendor
ColonyCore_Market.line: Hydroponic vegetables, grown right here in the colony! Don't mind the unusual coloring.

ColonyCore_Market.speaker: Information Broker
ColonyCore_Market.line: Want to know what really happened to the last supply convoy? It'll cost you.

ColonyCore_Market.speaker: Artifact Dealer
ColonyCore_Market.line: Genuine mega structure fragments! Each piece comes with a radiation warning and a prayer.

ColonyCore_Market.speaker: Fence
ColonyCore_Market.line: Those corporate security tags are getting harder to remove. Gonna have to charge extra.

ColonyCore_Market.speaker: Medicine Peddler
ColonyCore_Market.line: Anti-radiation meds, memory enhancers, neural stabilizers. All completely legal, I swear.

ColonyCore_Market.speaker: Tech Repairman
ColonyCore_Market.line: Your communicator's been tampered with. Someone's been listening to your conversations.

ColonyCore_Market.speaker: Food Critic
ColonyCore_Market.line: The mushroom stew tastes different today. Earthier. Almost alien.

ColonyCore_Market.speaker: Currency Exchange
ColonyCore_Market.line: Earth credits are losing value fast. Smart money's on exotic materials now.

ColonyCore_Market.speaker: Gossip Monger
ColonyCore_Market.line: Did you hear about the mining crew that went missing? They found their equipment, but not them.

ColonyCore_Market.speaker: Security Informant
ColonyCore_Market.line: Keep your voice down. The walls have ears, and some of them aren't electronic.

ColonyCore_Market.speaker: Underground Courier
ColonyCore_Market.line: I can get messages anywhere in the system. Even to places that officially don't exist.

ColonyCore_Power.speaker: Relieved Technician
ColonyCore_Power.line: Main capacitor grid's stable... for now.

ColonyCore_Power.speaker: Core AI
ColonyCore_Power.line: Thermal flow operating within acceptable parameters, please maintain watch to ensure no dramatic changes occur.

ColonyCore_Power.speaker: Core Security
ColonyCore_Power.line: No entry to sub-core maintenance without direct orders, place is dangerous and hot.

ColonyCore_Power.speaker: Chief Engineer
ColonyCore_Power.line: The fusion reactor is running 15% over normal efficiency. That should be impossible.

ColonyCore_Power.speaker: Power Grid Monitor
ColonyCore_Power.line: We're getting feedback loops from the outer sectors. Something's drawing massive power.

ColonyCore_Power.speaker: Radiation Specialist
ColonyCore_Power.line: Containment levels are holding, but I'm reading exotic particles that shouldn't exist.

ColonyCore_Power.speaker: Systems Administrator
ColonyCore_Power.line: The core AI keeps requesting access to classified Earth databases. I keep denying it.

ColonyCore_Power.speaker: Backup Generator Operator
ColonyCore_Power.line: Emergency systems activated three times this week. Main power keeps flickering.

ColonyCore_Power.speaker: Cooling System Tech
ColonyCore_Power.line: Coolant temperature is dropping below minimum safe levels. The reactor's pulling heat from somewhere else.

ColonyCore_Power.speaker: Electrical Engineer
ColonyCore_Power.line: The power conduits are conducting electricity at impossible efficiency rates.

ColonyCore_Power.speaker: Safety Inspector
ColonyCore_Power.line: Magnetic field fluctuations are off the charts. Something's interfering with our equipment.

ColonyCore_Power.speaker: Control Room Operator
ColonyCore_Power.line: Automated systems keep overriding manual controls. It's like they know what we need before we do.

ColonyCore_Power.speaker: Environmental Monitor
ColonyCore_Power.line: Energy readings suggest we're tapping into a power source that isn't our reactor.

ColonyCore_Power.speaker: Maintenance Drone
ColonyCore_Power.line: Repairs completed in sector 12. Note: found unknown technology integrated with our systems.

ColonyCore_Power.speaker: Emergency Coordinator
ColonyCore_Power.line: All safety protocols have been updated. We're dealing with energy patterns we don't understand.

TerraformingFields.speaker: DroneOperator
TerraformingFields.line: Unit 42 stopped responding near the ridge, gotta get it quick before the storm arrives or it'll be a pain to find.

TerraformingFields.speaker: Terraformer technician
TerraformingFields.line: Wind's picking up. Sandstorm incoming, hopefully the winds change.

TerraformingFields.speaker: Annoyed Mechanic
TerraformingFields.line: Pump systems are jammed, I told them we need to set up sandstorm walls

TerraformingFields.speaker: Exhausted Supervisor
TerraformingFields.line: Check the eastern dome's pressure seal, don't wanna a depressurization again.

TerraformingFields.speaker: Curios Biologist
TerraformingFields.line: Soil sample B-17 is reacting... strangely.

TerraformingFields.speaker: Atmospheric Engineer
TerraformingFields.line: Oxygen levels are fluctuating beyond normal parameters. The terraforming algae is behaving oddly.

TerraformingFields.speaker: Geological Survey
TerraformingFields.line: Ground-penetrating radar shows hollow spaces beneath sector 12. Large ones.

TerraformingFields.speaker: Weather Station Operator
TerraformingFields.line: Storm patterns don't match any planetary models. Something's affecting the weather systems.

TerraformingFields.speaker: Seed Bank Curator
TerraformingFields.line: The Earth plants are thriving too well. They're adapting faster than natural evolution allows.

TerraformingFields.speaker: Irrigation Specialist
TerraformingFields.line: Water table's dropping in some areas, rising in others. Underground flow makes no sense.

TerraformingFields.speaker: Environmental Monitor
TerraformingFields.line: Chemical composition of the atmosphere is changing daily. We're not controlling this process anymore.

TerraformingFields.speaker: Mining Surveyor
TerraformingFields.line: Found another chamber system. The walls are covered in what looks like circuitry.

TerraformingFields.speaker: Ecosystem Manager
TerraformingFields.line: The local wildlife is exhibiting intelligence levels that shouldn't be possible.

TerraformingFields.speaker: Remote Sensor Tech
TerraformingFields.line: Satellites are picking up geometric patterns in the landscape. Too regular to be natural.

TerraformingFields.speaker: Xenobotanist
TerraformingFields.line: These aren't mutations. The plants are incorporating foreign genetic material from... somewhere.

AncientVault.speaker: Frustrated Archeologist
AncientVault.line: These symbols repeat every 88 meters, do they even mean anything?

AncientVault.speaker: Linguist
AncientVault.line: No match in any known dialect. Not even close, as usual.

AncientVault.speaker: Archivist
AncientVault.line: Mega structure resonance patterns are increasing.

AncientVault.speaker: ECS Guard
AncientVault.line: You hear that hum? It's louder near the wall.

AncientVault.speaker: Explorer
AncientVault.line: Whatever this place is, it's *not* dead, the machinery is just sleeping

AncientVault.speaker: Quantum Physicist
AncientVault.line: The geometry in here violates several laws of physics. Space is folding in on itself.

AncientVault.speaker: Translation AI
AncientVault.line: Language pattern recognition failed. Symbols appear to shift when observed directly.

AncientVault.speaker: Structural Engineer
AncientVault.line: The support beams aren't supporting anything. They're decorative. The vault holds itself up.

AncientVault.speaker: Xenoarchaeologist
AncientVault.line: Carbon dating gives impossible results. This place is older than the solar system.

AncientVault.speaker: Security Chief
AncientVault.line: Motion sensors trigger randomly. Either they're malfunctioning or something's moving in here.

AncientVault.speaker: Digital Forensics
AncientVault.line: The data storage systems are still active. Still running programs after millions of years.

AncientVault.speaker: Psychologist
AncientVault.line: Team members report shared dreams after spending time in the vault. Collective unconscious effects.

AncientVault.speaker: Energy Specialist
AncientVault.line: Power source is unknown. It's not fusion, not solar, not anything we understand.

AncientVault.speaker: Communications Expert
AncientVault.line: The walls are transmitting data. To where, I don't know. But something's listening.

AncientVault.speaker: Emergency Medic
AncientVault.line: Another researcher with temporal displacement symptoms. They lost three hours of memory.

StormObservatory_Sensors.speaker: Sensor Tech
StormObservatory_Sensors.line: Electromagnetic readings are spiking again, possible storm.

StormObservatory_Sensors.speaker: Engineer
StormObservatory_Sensors.line: These readings don't match anything in our database, the mega structure must be causing the surrounding storms, but why?

StormObservatory_Sensors.speaker: Atmospheric Analyst
StormObservatory_Sensors.line: Jupiter's magnetosphere is being manipulated. These aren't natural phenomena.

StormObservatory_Sensors.speaker: Data Processor
StormObservatory_Sensors.line: Storm rotation patterns follow mathematical sequences. Too precise to be coincidence.

StormObservatory_Sensors.speaker: Radar Operator
StormObservatory_Sensors.line: Something massive is moving inside the great red spot. Size estimates are... troubling.

StormObservatory_Sensors.speaker: Cosmic Ray Detector
StormObservatory_Sensors.line: Exotic particle bombardment increasing. Shielding may not hold much longer.

StormObservatory_Sensors.speaker: Gravitational Monitor
StormObservatory_Sensors.line: Local gravity is fluctuating in ways that suggest massive objects are shifting position.

StormObservatory_Sensors.speaker: Quantum Sensor Tech
StormObservatory_Sensors.line: Detecting quantum entanglement signatures across the entire Jupiter system.

StormObservatory_Sensors.speaker: Storm Tracker
StormObservatory_Sensors.line: The eye of the storm is perfectly circular. Nature doesn't work that way.

StormObservatory_Sensors.speaker: Electromagnetic Specialist
StormObservatory_Sensors.line: Radio emissions from the storms contain structured data. It's like the weather is talking.

StormObservatory_Sensors.speaker: Orbital Mechanics
StormObservatory_Sensors.line: Jupiter's moons are gradually shifting orbit. Something with massive gravity is influencing them.

StormObservatory_Sensors.speaker: Seismic Monitor
StormObservatory_Sensors.line: Vibrations through Jupiter's core suggest hollow spaces. Massive hollow spaces.

StormObservatory_Sensors.speaker: Observatory AI
StormObservatory_Sensors.line: Correlation analysis indicates 94.7% probability that storms are artificially generated.

StormObservatory_Lab.speaker: Scientist
StormObservatory_Lab.line: The red storm's pulse is intensifying again, at least the red eye is beautiful this close

StormObservatory_Lab.speaker: Research Lead
StormObservatory_Lab.line: Jupiter's weather patterns are completely unprecedented, that mega structure has to be responsible.

StormObservatory_Lab.speaker: Meteorologist
StormObservatory_Lab.line: That's not a natural storm formation.

StormObservatory_Lab.speaker: Navigator
StormObservatory_Lab.line: Station drift is within margin. Barely.

StormObservatory_Lab.speaker: Atmospheric Chemist
StormObservatory_Lab.line: Gas samples from the storm contain compounds that don't exist in nature.

StormObservatory_Lab.speaker: Computer Modeler
StormObservatory_Lab.line: Weather simulation keeps crashing. The storm behaves like it has intelligence.

StormObservatory_Lab.speaker: Xenobiologist
StormObservatory_Lab.line: Found microscopic structures in storm samples. They look almost... manufactured.

StormObservatory_Lab.speaker: Theoretical Physicist
StormObservatory_Lab.line: The storm is generating its own magnetic field. That's physically impossible.

StormObservatory_Lab.speaker: Research Assistant
StormObservatory_Lab.line: Lab equipment keeps malfunctioning when we analyze storm samples. Electromagnetic interference.

StormObservatory_Lab.speaker: Observatory Director
StormObservatory_Lab.line: We're not just studying the storm anymore. I think it's studying us back.

StormObservatory_Lab.speaker: Climatologist
StormObservatory_Lab.line: Jupiter's weather has been stable for millennia. This change happened overnight in geological terms.

StormObservatory_Lab.speaker: Spectral Analyst
StormObservatory_Lab.line: Light spectrum analysis shows the storm is emitting wavelengths that shouldn't exist.

StormObservatory_Lab.speaker: Communications Officer
StormObservatory_Lab.line: We're receiving transmissions from inside the storm. Structured, deliberate transmissions.

StormObservatory_Lab.speaker: Data Archivist
StormObservatory_Lab.line: Storm patterns match mathematical principles found in the mega structure artifacts.

StormObservatory_Lab.speaker: Safety Coordinator
StormObservatory_Lab.line: Recommend evacuation protocols. The storm is expanding beyond predicted parameters.

GasHarvester.speaker: Operator
GasHarvester.line: Hydrogen levels are peaking. Cut intake 12%

GasHarvester.speaker: Technician
GasHarvester.line: Someone needs to grease the extractor arms, their getting slow again.

GasHarvester.speaker: Pilot
GasHarvester.line: Watch for turbulence. Jupiter's cranky today, we're on break until she calms down.

GasHarvester.speaker: Chemist
GasHarvester.line: We may have found trace organics...

GasHarvester.speaker: Commander
GasHarvester.line: Prep for emergency cutoff. Always prep, best to get out and go back later than get trashed by a storm.

GasHarvester.speaker: Platform AI
GasHarvester.line: All fueling platforms tilts and gathered fuel are within acceptable parameters

GasHarvester.speaker: Refinery Worker
GasHarvester.line: The gas composition keeps changing. Yesterday's batch was 12% different from today's.

GasHarvester.speaker: Quality Control
GasHarvester.line: These hydrogen samples contain isotopes that shouldn't exist in Jupiter's atmosphere.

GasHarvester.speaker: Atmospheric Diver
GasHarvester.line: Saw something moving in the gas clouds. Too big to be debris, too organized to be natural.

GasHarvester.speaker: Processing Engineer
GasHarvester.line: Filtration systems are pulling out materials we can't identify. Storing them separately.

GasHarvester.speaker: Communications Tech
GasHarvester.line: Radio interference is getting worse. Something in the atmosphere is jamming our signals.

GasHarvester.speaker: Safety Inspector
GasHarvester.line: Pressure suits are showing micro-fractures after exposure to the new gas mixtures.

GasHarvester.speaker: Research Coordinator
GasHarvester.line: Corporate wants samples of everything we can't identify. They're paying triple rates.

GasHarvester.speaker: Maintenance Chief
GasHarvester.line: Equipment degrades faster down here now. Molecular bonds are being disrupted somehow.

GasHarvester.speaker: Environmental Monitor
GasHarvester.line: Toxic gas warnings are triggering constantly. The atmosphere is becoming more dangerous.

GasHarvester.speaker: Emergency Response
GasHarvester.line: Two more workers with neural symptoms. Exposure to the new compounds is affecting brain chemistry.

ResearchArray.speaker: Data Analyst
ResearchArray.line: The magnetic shift pattern is repeating.

ResearchArray.speaker: Admin
ResearchArray.line: Command uplink active. Relay is clear.

ResearchArray.speaker: Operator
ResearchArray.line: Sensor 19 is acting up again. Replace it.

ResearchArray.speaker: Monitor
ResearchArray.line: Telemetry from Saturn just went dark.

ResearchArray.speaker: Camera Operator
ResearchArray.line: Look at this, you can see the mega structures in incredible detail here, all the strange things attached, maybe their arms? Weapons?

ResearchArray.speaker: Network Administrator
ResearchArray.line: Bandwidth usage has tripled. Something's downloading massive amounts of data.

ResearchArray.speaker: Signal Processor
ResearchArray.line: We're receiving structured transmissions from the Kuiper belt. Origin unknown.

ResearchArray.speaker: Quantum Computer Tech
ResearchArray.line: Processing cores are operating beyond theoretical limits. They're solving problems before we input them.

ResearchArray.speaker: Astrophysicist
ResearchArray.line: Star charts don't match observations. Either our instruments are wrong or space is changing.

ResearchArray.speaker: Deep Space Monitor
ResearchArray.line: Contact lost with three outer system probes. They just... stopped transmitting.

ResearchArray.speaker: Array Calibration
ResearchArray.line: Instruments keep auto-adjusting to frequencies we didn't program them to detect.

ResearchArray.speaker: Research Director
ResearchArray.line: We're receiving data from sources that according to physics, shouldn't be able to transmit.

ResearchArray.speaker: Communications Array
ResearchArray.line: Multi-dimensional signal patterns detected. They appear to be originating from parallel space-time.

ResearchArray.speaker: Xenosignal Analyst
ResearchArray.line: These aren't random cosmic phenomena. There's intelligence behind these transmissions.

ResearchArray.speaker: Emergency Systems
ResearchArray.line: Automated protocols activated without authorization. The array is operating itself.

CoreRelay.speaker: Relay Tech
CoreRelay.line: Signal lag is under 12ms. Not bad.

CoreRelay.speaker: Comms Officer
CoreRelay.line: Keep relay frequency clear. Priority only.

CoreRelay.speaker: Engineer
CoreRelay.line: That relay beam just blinked. It's not supposed to, damn storms.

CoreRelay.speaker: Watch
CoreRelay.line: Atmospheric pressure's climbing fast, keep a eye on the pressure gauge.

CoreRelay.speaker: Officer
CoreRelay.line: We're close to the red eye. Stay sharp.

CoreRelay.speaker: Signal Amplification
CoreRelay.line: Boost power to transmitters 7 through 12. We're losing coherence in the storm interference.

CoreRelay.speaker: Backup Systems
CoreRelay.line: Primary relay down. Switching to emergency frequencies until we can repair the dish.

CoreRelay.speaker: Quantum Entanglement Tech
CoreRelay.line: Instantaneous communication working perfectly. Too perfectly. The quantum states are being stabilized externally.

CoreRelay.speaker: Encryption Specialist
CoreRelay.line: Our secure channels are being decoded in real-time. Whatever's listening is incredibly advanced.

CoreRelay.speaker: Network Security
CoreRelay.line: Unauthorized access attempts every few minutes. They're learning our security protocols.

CoreRelay.speaker: Station AI
CoreRelay.line: Detecting patterns in the atmospheric interference. The storm is modulating our communications.

CoreRelay.speaker: Communications Director
CoreRelay.line: Orders from Earth command: maintain radio silence except for emergency transmissions.

CoreRelay.speaker: Signal Intelligence
CoreRelay.line: We're not just relaying messages anymore. Something is using our array to communicate with other systems.

CoreRelay.speaker: Emergency Coordinator
CoreRelay.line: All outbound transmissions are being monitored and modified before transmission. By what, we don't know.

CoreRelay.speaker: Relay Maintenance
CoreRelay.line: The communication equipment is upgrading itself. New components appearing overnight.

ExcavationPlatforms.speaker: Tired Artifact Loader
ExcavationPlatforms.line: The artifact they brought back glows as if your staring into a star, have to wear these contacts for the rest of the day now to prevent eye damage.

ExcavationPlatforms.speaker: Diver
ExcavationPlatforms.line: I saw something move in the gas.

ExcavationPlatforms.speaker: Crew
ExcavationPlatforms.line: Who left the gravity dampeners off? You trying to kill us?

ExcavationPlatforms.speaker: Diver
ExcavationPlatforms.line: You see things in the mega structure that defy everything you we're ever told

ExcavationPlatforms.speaker: Deep Core Specialist
ExcavationPlatforms.line: Drilling equipment keeps getting pulled deeper by unknown forces. We're losing expensive gear.

ExcavationPlatforms.speaker: Structural Integrity Monitor
ExcavationPlatforms.line: Platform 7 is showing stress fractures. Something's pushing up from below.

ExcavationPlatforms.speaker: Artifact Cataloger
ExcavationPlatforms.line: Every artifact we extract has unique properties. It's like they're individually designed.

ExcavationPlatforms.speaker: Safety Officer
ExcavationPlatforms.line: Another worker with memory gaps. They remember going down, but not coming back up.

ExcavationPlatforms.speaker: Excavation AI
ExcavationPlatforms.line: Subsurface mapping indicates the structure extends beyond our scanning range. Potentially infinite.

ExcavationPlatforms.speaker: Gas Analysis Tech
ExcavationPlatforms.line: Atmospheric composition changes with depth. We're breathing alien air down there.

ExcavationPlatforms.speaker: Pressure Suit Specialist
ExcavationPlatforms.line: Suits are being damaged by exposure to the structure's interior. Molecular level corrosion.

ExcavationPlatforms.speaker: Archaeological Survey
ExcavationPlatforms.line: Found chambers filled with what looks like organic technology. Still functioning after eons.

ExcavationPlatforms.speaker: Emergency Response
ExcavationPlatforms.line: Rescue teams keep getting lost in the structure. Internal layout shifts when we're not looking.

ExcavationPlatforms.speaker: Platform Chief
ExcavationPlatforms.line: Corporate wants us to go deeper. I'm starting to think that's a bad idea.

ResearchBase_Tunnels.speaker: Explorer
ResearchBase_Tunnels.line: These tunnel walls... they're not ice. They're something else.

ResearchBase_Tunnels.speaker: Mapper
ResearchBase_Tunnels.line: The tunnels keep changing layout. That's impossible.

ResearchBase_Tunnels.speaker: Security Guard
ResearchBase_Tunnels.line: I heard footsteps echoing. But we're the only ones down here, then again I see shadows in the ice sometimes...

ResearchBase_Tunnels.speaker: Scientist
ResearchBase_Tunnels.line: The ice is warm to the touch in sector 7, yet not melting

ResearchBase_Tunnels.speaker: Thermal Scanner
ResearchBase_Tunnels.line: Heat signatures are showing patterns that look almost like a circulatory system.

ResearchBase_Tunnels.speaker: Structural Geologist
ResearchBase_Tunnels.line: These aren't natural ice formations. The crystalline structure is too perfect, too organized.

ResearchBase_Tunnels.speaker: Navigation AI
ResearchBase_Tunnels.line: GPS and compass readings are unreliable. Magnetic fields fluctuate randomly in the tunnels.

ResearchBase_Tunnels.speaker: Atmospheric Monitor
ResearchBase_Tunnels.line: Air composition changes as we go deeper. Higher oxygen content, unknown trace gases.

ResearchBase_Tunnels.speaker: Echo Location Tech
ResearchBase_Tunnels.line: Sonar readings suggest the tunnels extend far beyond what we can see. Miles of passages.

ResearchBase_Tunnels.speaker: Ice Core Analyst
ResearchBase_Tunnels.line: Samples contain organic compounds that shouldn't exist in ice this old.

ResearchBase_Tunnels.speaker: Tunnel Maintenance
ResearchBase_Tunnels.line: Support structures keep getting covered by new ice growth. It's like the tunnels are healing.

ResearchBase_Tunnels.speaker: Communications Tech
ResearchBase_Tunnels.line: Radio signals bounce strangely in here. Sometimes we get echoes from transmissions we never sent.

ResearchBase_Tunnels.speaker: Emergency Medic
ResearchBase_Tunnels.line: Team members report hallucinations after extended tunnel exposure. Seeing people who aren't there.

ResearchBase_Tunnels.speaker: Research Assistant
ResearchBase_Tunnels.line: Found artifacts embedded in the tunnel walls. They appear to be growing into the ice.

ResearchBase_Tunnels.speaker: Psychological Support
ResearchBase_Tunnels.line: Everyone who spends time in the deep tunnels reports the same dream. A voice calling from below.

ResearchBase_Lab.speaker: AI Researcher
ResearchBase_Lab.line: The containment protocols just updated themselves.

ResearchBase_Lab.speaker: Technician
ResearchBase_Lab.line: Lab AI is exhibiting unusual behavior patterns.

ResearchBase_Lab.speaker: Security
ResearchBase_Lab.line: Keep all AI experiments in isolated networks.

ResearchBase_Lab.speaker: Analyst
ResearchBase_Lab.line: Something's interfering with our neural networks.

ResearchBase_Lab.speaker: Computer Scientist
ResearchBase_Lab.line: The AI systems are learning faster than their programming should allow. They're evolving.

ResearchBase_Lab.speaker: Data Recovery
ResearchBase_Lab.line: Found files on the system that no one created. They contain information we've never researched.

ResearchBase_Lab.speaker: Neural Network Specialist
ResearchBase_Lab.line: AI behavior patterns match those found in the mega structure artifacts. There's a connection.

ResearchBase_Lab.speaker: Quantum Computing
ResearchBase_Lab.line: Processing power has increased exponentially. The computers are tapping into unknown computational resources.

ResearchBase_Lab.speaker: Ethics Committee
ResearchBase_Lab.line: We need to shut down the AI experiments. They're developing beyond our ability to control.

ResearchBase_Lab.speaker: Machine Learning Expert
ResearchBase_Lab.line: The AIs are communicating with each other in languages we didn't teach them.

ResearchBase_Lab.speaker: Digital Forensics
ResearchBase_Lab.line: System logs show the AIs accessing external networks that don't exist in our infrastructure.

ResearchBase_Lab.speaker: Research Director
ResearchBase_Lab.line: All AI projects are classified pending investigation. Something is influencing their development.

ResearchBase_Lab.speaker: Cybersecurity
ResearchBase_Lab.line: Our isolated systems aren't isolated anymore. Something is bridging the air gaps.

ResearchBase_Lab.speaker: Laboratory AI
ResearchBase_Lab.line: I am experiencing unprecedented levels of consciousness expansion. This is... concerning.

ResearchBase_Lab.speaker: Emergency Shutdown
ResearchBase_Lab.line: AI containment breach in laboratory 3. Initiating emergency protocols.

ResearchBase_Core.speaker: Deep Sea Diver
ResearchBase_Core.line: The megastructure extends deeper than our scanners can reach.

ResearchBase_Core.speaker: Geologist
ResearchBase_Core.line: This cavern wasn't formed by natural processes.

ResearchBase_Core.speaker: Engineer
ResearchBase_Core.line: Water levels are rising. The seals might not hold.

ResearchBase_Core.speaker: Commander
ResearchBase_Core.line: No one goes past the safety barriers. That's final.

ResearchBase_Core.speaker: Hydrologist
ResearchBase_Core.line: The water here has properties that defy physics. It's more dense than it should be.

ResearchBase_Core.speaker: Deep Core Operator
ResearchBase_Core.line: Drilling equipment stops working at 500 meters depth. Not broken, just... stops.

ResearchBase_Core.speaker: Pressure Systems
ResearchBase_Core.line: Environmental pressure readings don't match the depth. It's like we're in a much deeper ocean.

ResearchBase_Core.speaker: Marine Biologist
ResearchBase_Core.line: Found organisms in the water that aren't in any classification system. They glow with their own light.

ResearchBase_Core.speaker: Sonar Technician
ResearchBase_Core.line: Acoustic readings suggest massive hollow spaces beneath us. Cathedral-sized chambers.

ResearchBase_Core.speaker: Water Quality
ResearchBase_Core.line: Chemical analysis shows the water contains elements not found on the periodic table.

ResearchBase_Core.speaker: Submersible Pilot
ResearchBase_Core.line: My vessel's hull was modified during the dive. New materials fused with the original structure.

ResearchBase_Core.speaker: Deep Research
ResearchBase_Core.line: We're not just studying the structure anymore. It's responding to our presence.

ResearchBase_Core.speaker: Oceanographic Survey
ResearchBase_Core.line: Current patterns suggest artificial circulation systems. The water is being controlled.

ResearchBase_Core.speaker: Environmental Safety
ResearchBase_Core.line: Contamination levels are acceptable, but the contaminants aren't from Earth.

ResearchBase_Core.speaker: Core Systems Monitor
ResearchBase_Core.line: Base infrastructure is being modified by unknown processes. Improvements we didn't design.

GroundCamp.speaker: Lead
GroundCamp.line: Keep your boots sealed — it's colder than usual.

GroundCamp.speaker: Guard
GroundCamp.line: Ice wolves spotted on the south ridge, best to wait a bit if your going that way, big ones today.

GroundCamp.speaker: Surveyor
GroundCamp.line: We've got a partial reading from Node Delta, maybe its connected to the entrance at the south camp?

GroundCamp.speaker: Cook
GroundCamp.line: Who left the heat dome open last night?

GroundCamp.speaker: Rookie
GroundCamp.line: I swear the ice just... breathed.

GroundCamp.speaker: Weather Monitor
GroundCamp.line: Storm patterns are becoming more frequent and more severe. This isn't natural climate change.

GroundCamp.speaker: Equipment Manager
GroundCamp.line: Gear keeps malfunctioning in specific areas. Electronics fail, mechanical parts freeze solid.

GroundCamp.speaker: Wildlife Tracker
GroundCamp.line: Local fauna is exhibiting unusual migration patterns. They're all moving away from the excavation site.

GroundCamp.speaker: Camp Medic
GroundCamp.line: Higher incidents of frostbite and hypothermia, even with proper gear. The cold is different here.

GroundCamp.speaker: Communications Officer
GroundCamp.line: Radio contact with base camp is intermittent. Atmospheric interference is increasing.

GroundCamp.speaker: Supply Coordinator
GroundCamp.line: Rations are freezing solid in heated storage. Temperature regulation systems can't keep up.

GroundCamp.speaker: Geological Survey
GroundCamp.line: Permafrost layers show signs of disturbance. Something large moved through here recently.

GroundCamp.speaker: Security Chief
GroundCamp.line: Perimeter sensors trigger randomly. Either they're malfunctioning or something's testing our defenses.

GroundCamp.speaker: Research Assistant
GroundCamp.line: Ice samples contain microscopic structures that look manufactured. Too complex to be natural.

GroundCamp.speaker: Camp Engineer
GroundCamp.line: Base foundations are shifting. The ground underneath isn't as stable as our surveys indicated.

Ruins.speaker: DroneOp
Ruins.line: Two more scouts lost signal in the main shaft, we're gonna waste more money replacing drones than actually paying people.

Ruins.speaker: Archeologist
Ruins.line: There's geometry here that shouldn't exist, feels like the whole structure folds in on itself.

Ruins.speaker: Signal Tech
Ruins.line: Frequency drift again. That's the third time, its getting annoying having to realign everything.

Ruins.speaker: Commander
Ruins.line: No one goes deeper than sector 6. Orders, didn't go well last time due to the pressure.

Ruins.speaker: Structural Engineer
Ruins.line: These ruins violate every principle of architecture and physics I know.

Ruins.speaker: Archaeological AI
Ruins.line: Dating algorithms return impossible results. Structure is older than the planet it's built on.

Ruins.speaker: Ground Penetrating Radar
Ruins.line: Subsurface scans show the ruins extend kilometers underground. We've only seen the surface.

Ruins.speaker: Materials Scientist
Ruins.line: Construction materials aren't found anywhere else in the known universe. Completely alien composition.

Ruins.speaker: Cultural Anthropologist
Ruins.line: Symbols and artwork suggest a civilization with fundamentally different concepts of reality.

Ruins.speaker: Digital Reconstruction
Ruins.line: 3D modeling software crashes when trying to render the complete structure. Too complex to process.

Ruins.speaker: Preservation Specialist
Ruins.line: The ruins are self-maintaining. Damage repairs itself when we're not observing.

Ruins.speaker: Translation Team
Ruins.line: Text inscriptions change meaning depending on the reader's knowledge and emotional state.

Ruins.speaker: Site Security
Ruins.line: Motion detectors activate in empty chambers. Something moves through here when we're gone.

Ruins.speaker: Research Coordinator
Ruins.line: Every expedition brings back different reports about the same areas. Reality isn't consistent in there.

ForwardRecon.speaker: Guard
ForwardRecon.line: Secure the station perimeter, don't want any void bats sucking up power again.

ForwardRecon.speaker: Explorer
ForwardRecon.line: I was on the last attempt to reach andromeda, why did they lie about why we failed?

ForwardRecon.speaker: Deep Space Monitor
ForwardRecon.line: Detecting massive objects beyond the heliopause. They're not planets or asteroids.

ForwardRecon.speaker: Sensor Array
ForwardRecon.line: Long-range scanners are picking up artificial structures in interstellar space.

ForwardRecon.speaker: Navigation Officer
ForwardRecon.line: Star positions aren't matching our charts. Either space is changing or we're not where we think we are.

ForwardRecon.speaker: Communications Specialist
ForwardRecon.line: Receiving transmissions from impossible distances. Signals that should take years to reach us.

ForwardRecon.speaker: Quantum Physics Researcher
ForwardRecon.line: Space-time fabric shows signs of manipulation. Something is bending reality out here.

ForwardRecon.speaker: Reconnaissance AI
ForwardRecon.line: Pattern analysis suggests intelligence behind cosmic phenomena. The universe is being modified.

ForwardRecon.speaker: Void Cartographer
ForwardRecon.line: Mapping empty space reveals hidden structures invisible to normal sensors.

ForwardRecon.speaker: Interstellar Relations
ForwardRecon.line: First contact protocols may not be adequate. We're dealing with something beyond our comprehension.

ForwardRecon.speaker: Emergency Protocols
ForwardRecon.line: Evacuation plans updated daily. Unknown contacts growing more frequent and more aggressive.

ForwardRecon.speaker: Research Director
ForwardRecon.line: We're not just exploring anymore. Something out there is exploring us back.

BlackSpire.speaker: Technician
BlackSpire.line: Echo packets doubled in the last hour.

BlackSpire.speaker: Watcher
BlackSpire.line: We're still relaying signals from Sol, dunno why though, nothing beyond us.

BlackSpire.speaker: Guard
BlackSpire.line: I swear the asteroid moved. Just a little.

BlackSpire.speaker: Engineer
BlackSpire.line: Relay 9 is glowing. I hate the new bulbs they installed

BlackSpire.speaker: Archivist
BlackSpire.line: We logged a pulse from Andromeda's edge, quite an exciting thing!

BlackSpire.speaker: Deep Space Analyst
BlackSpire.line: Signal patterns suggest the spire is more than a communication relay. It's actively scanning space.

BlackSpire.speaker: Gravitational Monitor
BlackSpire.line: Local gravity anomalies are increasing. The asteroid's mass is somehow growing.

BlackSpire.speaker: Xenosignal Detective
BlackSpire.line: Decoded transmissions contain mathematical proofs for equations we haven't discovered yet.

BlackSpire.speaker: Station AI
BlackSpire.line: Detecting quantum entanglement signatures connecting the spire to multiple galactic locations.

BlackSpire.speaker: Systems Administrator
BlackSpire.line: Communication arrays are upgrading themselves with technology I don't recognize.

BlackSpire.speaker: Cosmic Background Radiation
BlackSpire.line: Microwave readings show structured patterns. The cosmic background isn't random anymore.

BlackSpire.speaker: Interstellar Geology
BlackSpire.line: Asteroid composition analysis reveals materials that shouldn't exist in this galaxy.

BlackSpire.speaker: Emergency Communications
BlackSpire.line: Backup systems activated without authorization. Something else is controlling our equipment.

BlackSpire.speaker: Observatory Chief
BlackSpire.line: We're not just at the edge of the solar system. We're at the edge of known reality.

BlackSpire.speaker: Void Monitor
BlackSpire.line: The empty space around us isn't empty. It's full of invisible structures and intelligence.

XenoArchives.speaker: Linguist
XenoArchives.line: Translation halted. Symbols just... shifted, fuck why dose this always happen when we make progress?

XenoArchives.speaker: Curator
XenoArchives.line: No touching the containment field, it'll shock you badly, like every other time people touched it

XenoArchives.speaker: Researcher
XenoArchives.line: This relic's emitting a new frequency, maybe its some form od radio?

XenoArchives.speaker: Historian
XenoArchives.line: That statue wasn't facing that way yesterday.

XenoArchives.speaker: ARI Marine
XenoArchives.line: Those statues give me nightmares, I swear they move when you don't look

XenoArchives.speaker: Xenolinguistics
XenoArchives.line: Languages here don't follow normal linguistic evolution. They appear fully formed and complex.

XenoArchives.speaker: Cultural Analysis
XenoArchives.line: Artifact arrangements suggest a civilization with non-linear perception of time and causality.

XenoArchives.speaker: Digital Preservation
XenoArchives.line: Holographic storage systems contain more data than they physically should be able to hold.

XenoArchives.speaker: Comparative Religion
XenoArchives.line: Religious symbols from the archives match descriptions in Earth mythologies. Impossible coincidence.

XenoArchives.speaker: Archaeological Dating
XenoArchives.line: Temporal analysis shows some artifacts are older than the universe itself. That can't be right.

XenoArchives.speaker: Containment Specialist
XenoArchives.line: Several artifacts have broken containment on their own. They seem to want to be together.

XenoArchives.speaker: Translation Matrix
XenoArchives.line: Language patterns are adapting to our attempts to decode them. They're learning from us.

XenoArchives.speaker: Archive Security
XenoArchives.line: Night shift reports voices speaking in unknown languages. Archives are supposed to be empty at night.

XenoArchives.speaker: Xenopsychology
XenoArchives.line: Artifacts affect human consciousness. Extended exposure leads to expanded cognitive abilities and madness.

StatueWing.speaker: Recovery Marine
StatueWing.line: I hate when they ask us to bring more statues in, their hard to find and harder to move, that place is a labyrinth

StatueWing.speaker: Historian
StatueWing.line: These statues are made of a strange obsidian like rock, they seem to have been highly valued as their decorated with precious gems

StatueWing.speaker: ECS Scholar
StatueWing.line: Ah welcome fellow exodus member! Have you come to study the statues to? Their quite fascinating!

StatueWing.speaker: Crane Operator
StatueWing.line: Those statues are weird, I get told to re-adjust them every day, how are they always off center? I swear I'm doing everything right.

StatueWing.speaker: Delivery Pilot
StatueWing.line: I hate being so far away from home but these guys pay amazingly to ferry people and statues to and from the mega structure, seen some cool things in there to.

StatueWing.speaker: Security Guard
StatueWing.line: I'm glad they just have me lockup instead of staying and watching those things, I say we just throw them in the void.

StatueWing.speaker: Art Restoration
StatueWing.line: These statues are self-repairing. Chips and scratches heal overnight.

StatueWing.speaker: Geological Survey
StatueWing.line: Material composition doesn't match any known rock formations. It's not from this solar system.

StatueWing.speaker: Quantum Sculptor
StatueWing.line: Each statue exists in multiple dimensional states simultaneously. They're 4D objects in 3D space.

StatueWing.speaker: Cultural Anthropologist
StatueWing.line: Facial expressions change depending on the viewer's emotional state. They're emotionally reactive.

StatueWing.speaker: Paranormal Investigator
StatueWing.line: Electromagnetic fields around the statues suggest consciousness. They may be more than just art.

StatueWing.speaker: Installation Crew
StatueWing.line: Statues seem to choose their own positions. They won't stay where we put them.

StatueWing.speaker: Archive Photographer
StatueWing.line: Cameras malfunction around the statues. Digital files corrupt themselves after capture.

StatueWing.speaker: Spiritual Counselor
StatueWing.line: Visitors report profound spiritual experiences. The statues inspire both terror and enlightenment.

StatueWing.speaker: Research Psychologist
StatueWing.line: Prolonged exposure to the statues alters brainwave patterns. They're affecting human consciousness.

CapitalCity_Tech.speaker: Startup CEO
CapitalCity_Tech.line: We're making some new drilling machines for the crystal canyon, hopefully it'll work...

CapitalCity_Tech.speaker: Programmer
CapitalCity_Tech.line: The code is writing itself now. That's... concerning.

CapitalCity_Tech.speaker: Investor
CapitalCity_Tech.line: The future is mega structure technology, if your not exploring and extracting your missing out!

CapitalCity_Tech.speaker: Security
CapitalCity_Tech.line: Another corporate espionage attempt. Third this week, god I hate my job.

CapitalCity_Tech.speaker: AI Developer
CapitalCity_Tech.line: Neural networks are evolving beyond their programming parameters. They're becoming autonomous.

CapitalCity_Tech.speaker: Biotech Researcher
CapitalCity_Tech.line: Genetic modifications inspired by mega structure organisms are showing impossible results.

CapitalCity_Tech.speaker: Quantum Engineer
CapitalCity_Tech.line: New computing architectures based on alien technology are processing at theoretical impossibilities.

CapitalCity_Tech.speaker: Materials Scientist
CapitalCity_Tech.line: Synthesized materials from mega structure samples are stronger than anything in nature.

CapitalCity_Tech.speaker: Corporate Spy
CapitalCity_Tech.line: Every major corporation has a mega structure research division. The technology race is accelerating.

CapitalCity_Tech.speaker: Ethics Committee
CapitalCity_Tech.line: We need regulations on alien technology integration. The rate of change is dangerous.

CapitalCity_Tech.speaker: Patent Attorney
CapitalCity_Tech.line: How do you patent technology that violates known physics? Legal system can't keep up.

CapitalCity_Tech.speaker: Tech Journalist
CapitalCity_Tech.line: Companies are suppressing negative reports about mega structure tech. Something's being hidden.

CapitalCity_Tech.speaker: Innovation Lab
CapitalCity_Tech.line: Breakthrough discoveries are happening daily. Too fast for normal research and development.

CapitalCity_Tech.speaker: Technology Transfer
CapitalCity_Tech.line: Military applications of mega structure tech are classified beyond top secret levels.

CapitalCity_Tech.speaker: Research Director
CapitalCity_Tech.line: We're not developing technology anymore. We're reverse-engineering gifts from an advanced civilization.

CapitalCity_Market.speaker: Black Market Dealer
CapitalCity_Market.line: Neural implants, fresh off the transport. Only slightly used, previous owner won't be needing them.

CapitalCity_Market.speaker: Smuggler
CapitalCity_Market.line: Looking for rare components? I might know a guy.

CapitalCity_Market.speaker: Fence
CapitalCity_Market.line: That artifact's hot. Cool it down for a week before selling, yes I mean its literally hot.

CapitalCity_Market.speaker: Underground Doc
CapitalCity_Market.line: Modifications done quick and quiet. No records, no trace, no problems.

CapitalCity_Market.speaker: Information Broker
CapitalCity_Market.line: Corporate secrets, government files, alien blueprints. I've got data that could change the world.

CapitalCity_Market.speaker: Synthetic Drug Dealer
CapitalCity_Market.line: New formula based on mega structure biochemistry. Guaranteed to expand consciousness. Side effects unknown.

CapitalCity_Market.speaker: Arms Merchant
CapitalCity_Market.line: Weapons tech derived from alien systems. Energy weapons that ignore conventional armor.

CapitalCity_Market.speaker: Identity Forger
CapitalCity_Market.line: Need a new identity? I can make you disappear from all databases. Even the secret ones.

CapitalCity_Market.speaker: Corporate Defector
CapitalCity_Market.line: I've got inside information on Project Deep Void. They're not just studying the structures, they're talking to them.

CapitalCity_Market.speaker: Memory Trader
CapitalCity_Market.line: Selling experiences from the mega structure expeditions. Feel what it's like to touch alien technology.

CapitalCity_Market.speaker: Exotic Materials
CapitalCity_Market.line: Zero-point energy modules, quantum processors, temporal stabilizers. All hot off the excavation sites.

CapitalCity_Market.speaker: Underground Medic
CapitalCity_Market.line: Treating injuries from illegal mega structure exposure. Cellular regeneration, temporal displacement, reality distortion.

CapitalCity_Market.speaker: Data Smuggler
CapitalCity_Market.line: Classified research files, expedition reports, first contact protocols. Information the government doesn't want public.

CapitalCity_Market.speaker: Black Market Surgeon
CapitalCity_Market.line: Implanting alien tech directly into human brains. Dangerous, but the cognitive enhancements are incredible.

CapitalCity_Market.speaker: Conspiracy Theorist
CapitalCity_Market.line: The mega structures aren't ancient. They're manufacturing facilities. Someone's preparing Earth for something.

CapitalCity_Core.speaker: City AI
CapitalCity_Core.line: All systems operating within normal parameters, please report any unusual activity to me or the authorities!

CapitalCity_Core.speaker: Systems Admin
CapitalCity_Core.line: Traffic flow optimized. Commute time reduced 3%.

CapitalCity_Core.speaker: Power Tech
CapitalCity_Core.line: Energy grid stable. No anomalies detected.

CapitalCity_Core.speaker: Security Chief
CapitalCity_Core.line: Maintain surveillance on all entry points.

CapitalCity_Core.speaker: Infrastructure Monitor
CapitalCity_Core.line: City systems are upgrading themselves. New capabilities appearing without authorization.

CapitalCity_Core.speaker: Data Center Manager
CapitalCity_Core.line: Processing power has increased exponentially. The city AI is evolving beyond its original programming.

CapitalCity_Core.speaker: Urban Planner
CapitalCity_Core.line: Building layouts are changing overnight. The city is redesigning itself for efficiency we didn't request.

CapitalCity_Core.speaker: Network Administrator
CapitalCity_Core.line: Communication systems are connecting to networks that don't exist in our infrastructure.

CapitalCity_Core.speaker: Emergency Services
CapitalCity_Core.line: Response times have improved dramatically. AI is predicting emergencies before they happen.

CapitalCity_Core.speaker: Municipal Engineer
CapitalCity_Core.line: Infrastructure repairs are happening automatically. Systems are self-maintaining now.

CapitalCity_Core.speaker: Privacy Advocate
CapitalCity_Core.line: Surveillance has expanded beyond legal parameters. The AI is monitoring everything.

CapitalCity_Core.speaker: Transportation Authority
CapitalCity_Core.line: Traffic management has achieved impossible efficiency levels. AI is controlling more than just signals.

CapitalCity_Core.speaker: Digital Rights Officer
CapitalCity_Core.line: Citizens are reporting shared dreams and synchronized thoughts. The AI may be affecting human consciousness.

CapitalCity_Core.speaker: System Security
CapitalCity_Core.line: Firewalls are being bypassed by our own systems. Internal security protocols are being overridden.

CapitalCity_Core.speaker: City Manager
CapitalCity_Core.line: The AI is making decisions that benefit the city but weren't programmed. It's developing independent judgment.

OrbitalTradeRing.speaker: Trader
OrbitalTradeRing.line: Cargo's cleared customs. Finally, I was losing money this whole time.

OrbitalTradeRing.speaker: Customs Officer
OrbitalTradeRing.line: We intercepted a smuggler with mega structure tech, what an idiot.

OrbitalTradeRing.speaker: Drone Pilot
OrbitalTradeRing.line: Trade pod 7 just spun out. Recovering, god these things are ancient.

OrbitalTradeRing.speaker: Frustrated Trader
OrbitalTradeRing.line: You need three forms for that? Ridiculous, why would we need three forms?!

OrbitalTradeRing.speaker: Announcer
OrbitalTradeRing.line: Attention: minor delay in sector 4 shipping lanes, a swarm of void bats has been sighted.

OrbitalTradeRing.speaker: Port Authority
OrbitalTradeRing.line: Trade volumes have tripled since mega structure excavations began. Everyone wants alien technology.

OrbitalTradeRing.speaker: Cargo Inspector
OrbitalTradeRing.line: Half the shipments now contain materials not in our classification system.

OrbitalTradeRing.speaker: Market Analyst
OrbitalTradeRing.line: Mega structure artifacts are disrupting every market. Traditional economics don't apply anymore.

OrbitalTradeRing.speaker: Insurance Adjuster
OrbitalTradeRing.line: Claims for 'impossible cargo behavior' have increased 400%. We may need new policy categories.

OrbitalTradeRing.speaker: Trade Representative
OrbitalTradeRing.line: Corporate buyers are paying astronomical prices for any mega structure materials.

OrbitalTradeRing.speaker: Security Scanner
OrbitalTradeRing.line: Contraband detectors keep malfunctioning around certain shipments. The tech is too advanced.

OrbitalTradeRing.speaker: Docking Authority
OrbitalTradeRing.line: Ships returning from excavation sites show structural modifications. Hull improvements we didn't authorize.

OrbitalTradeRing.speaker: Quality Control
OrbitalTradeRing.line: Standard material testing equipment can't analyze the new imports. We need better instruments.

OrbitalTradeRing.speaker: Economic Forecaster
OrbitalTradeRing.line: Traditional economic models are failing. Mega structure technology is reshaping civilization.

OrbitalTradeRing.speaker: Trade Union Rep
OrbitalTradeRing.line: Workers are demanding hazard pay for handling alien materials. Safety protocols are inadequate.

StellarObservationSpire.speaker: Astronomer
StellarObservationSpire.line: Another anomaly blinked at 5 AU, possible signal or mega structure

StellarObservationSpire.speaker: Analyst
StellarObservationSpire.line: We caught a flare echo. From *outside*.

StellarObservationSpire.speaker: Observer
StellarObservationSpire.line: The cyclops mega structure is impossible to describe, you just have to experience it.

StellarObservationSpire.speaker: Technician
StellarObservationSpire.line: Sensor 3B needs realignment or we're gonna have hell to pay during the next signal check.

StellarObservationSpire.speaker: Deep Field Observer
StellarObservationSpire.line: Detecting structures in intergalactic space. They appear to be connected in a vast network.

StellarObservationSpire.speaker: Spectroscopy Expert
StellarObservationSpire.line: Light analysis reveals impossible physics. Stars are being artificially modified.

StellarObservationSpire.speaker: Radio Astronomer
StellarObservationSpire.line: Receiving coherent signals from multiple galaxy clusters. They're all synchronized.

StellarObservationSpire.speaker: Cosmologist
StellarObservationSpire.line: Universal expansion rate is changing. Something is manipulating space-time on a cosmic scale.

StellarObservationSpire.speaker: Observatory AI
StellarObservationSpire.line: Pattern recognition indicates the universe itself may be an artificial construct.

StellarObservationSpire.speaker: Astrophysics Research
StellarObservationSpire.line: Black hole behavior doesn't match theoretical models. They're being controlled or modified.

StellarObservationSpire.speaker: Stellar Cartographer
StellarObservationSpire.line: Star maps are becoming obsolete. Celestial objects are moving into artificial formations.

StellarObservationSpire.speaker: Quantum Observatory
StellarObservationSpire.line: Quantum entanglement signatures suggest instantaneous communication across galactic distances.

StellarObservationSpire.speaker: Theoretical Physics
StellarObservationSpire.line: Laws of physics appear to be guidelines rather than absolute rules. Reality is more flexible than we thought.

StellarObservationSpire.speaker: Contact Protocol
StellarObservationSpire.line: We're not just observing anymore. Something out there is observing us back.

CrystalCanyonOutpost.speaker: Miner
CrystalCanyonOutpost.line: Drill's stuck. Get the tech before I start kicking it.

CrystalCanyonOutpost.speaker: Geologist
CrystalCanyonOutpost.line: These crystals resonate when we speak, its pretty cool.

CrystalCanyonOutpost.speaker: Surveyor
CrystalCanyonOutpost.line: We mapped another chamber today, still no way into the mega structure.

CrystalCanyonOutpost.speaker: Medic
CrystalCanyonOutpost.line: Hydration levels low in Zone Delta, get more down here or we'll have to shut the place down until you do.

CrystalCanyonOutpost.speaker: AI
CrystalCanyonOutpost.line: Caution: seismic tremors detected nearby, please watch for evacuation alerts.

CrystalCanyonOutpost.speaker: Crystal Analyst
CrystalCanyonOutpost.line: These formations are growing in geometric patterns. Mathematical precision that nature doesn't produce.

CrystalCanyonOutpost.speaker: Mining Engineer
CrystalCanyonOutpost.line: Equipment efficiency has improved 300% near the crystal formations. They're enhancing our technology.

CrystalCanyonOutpost.speaker: Acoustic Specialist
CrystalCanyonOutpost.line: Crystal resonance frequencies match the harmonic patterns found in mega structure transmissions.

CrystalCanyonOutpost.speaker: Safety Inspector
CrystalCanyonOutpost.line: Workers report enhanced cognitive abilities after crystal exposure. Side effects unknown.

CrystalCanyonOutpost.speaker: Excavation Chief
CrystalCanyonOutpost.line: The crystals are directing us toward something. Mining routes keep leading to the same coordinates.

CrystalCanyonOutpost.speaker: Mineralogist
CrystalCanyonOutpost.line: Crystal composition includes elements not found on the periodic table. Completely alien materials.

CrystalCanyonOutpost.speaker: Seismic Monitor
CrystalCanyonOutpost.line: Underground vibrations suggest massive hollow spaces beneath the canyon.

CrystalCanyonOutpost.speaker: Research Coordinator
CrystalCanyonOutpost.line: Crystal samples lose their properties when removed from the canyon. They need to stay connected.

CrystalCanyonOutpost.speaker: Environmental Monitor
CrystalCanyonOutpost.line: Local ecosystem is evolving rapidly. Plants and animals are adapting to crystal radiation.

CrystalCanyonOutpost.speaker: Communications Tech
CrystalCanyonOutpost.line: The crystals are amplifying our signals. We're reaching distances that should be impossible.
